tool_description: Check if an email, username, password, or phone number was compromised in a data breach.
name: BreachDirectory
title: BreachDirectory

api_list.name: index
api_list.description: Base URL for using each of BreachDirectory's API functions: auto, sources, and password.

required_parameters.name: term
required_parameters.description: Enter the proper search term given the function you selected.

required_parameters.name: func
required_parameters.description:
Select the function you wish to use from the following:
- auto: Returns passwords, SHA-1 hashes, and sources given any username or email.
- sources: Returns sources given username or email.
- password: Returns how many times a given password has been leaked.
- domain: Returns passwords, SHA-1 hashes, and sources given any domain (Limited to 1000 results for security).
- dehash: Attempts to decrypt a given hash.
